mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room(roomId, type, name, topic, muted, member, sysMes, msgSum, lastChatAt, creatorName, creatorId, jitsiTimeout, readOnly, archived, defaultRoom, createdAt, updatedAt, unreadCount, totalReadCount, lastMessage) VALUES (#{roomId},#{type},#{name},#{topic},#{muted},#{member},#{sysMes},#{msgSum},#{lastChatAt},#{creatorName},#{creatorId}, #{jitsiTimeout},#{readOnly},#{archived},#{defaultRoom},#{createdAt},#{updatedAt},#{unreadCount},#{totalReadCount},#{lastMessage})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room where roomId = #{id} limit 1
SELECT * FROM room where roomId like ${condition}
SELECT * FROM room where name like ${condition} and type != 'd'
SELECT * FROM room ORDER BY lastChatAt DESC
SELECT count(1) FROM room where roomId = #{id}
